titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to require that all contributions in elections for Federal office be subject to that Act.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 8/8/1988--Passed House amended. (Measure passed House, amended) Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit a candidate or the authorized political committee of a candidate from accepting any contribution with respect to a Federal election unless the contribution is subject to such Act at the time the contribution is originally made and at all other times.
